adventure_name: Build It Up, Knock It Down
adventure_overview: Lions will have fun building a structure on their own and as a team. Prior to any activity, use Scouting America SAFE Checklist to ensure the safety of all those involved. All participants in official Scouting America activities should become familiar with the Guide to Safe Scouting and applicable program literature or manuals.

requirements.text: With your Lion adult partner, build a structure.

activities.name: Building Block House
activities.description: Use LEGO building blocks to build a house.

activities.name: Cardboard Skyscraper
activities.description: Lions work with their adult partners to build a shoe box skyscraper.

activities.name: Gingerbread House
activities.description: Cub Scouts work with their adult partner to make a gingerbread house.

requirements.text: With your den or family, build a structure.

activities.name: Cup Pyramid
activities.description: Take turns to build a cup pyramid.

activities.name: Pillow and Blanket Fort
activities.description: Build a pillow and blanket fort.

activities.name: We Built This City Out of Card and Board
activities.description: The den will work together to make a cardboard city.

requirements.text: Build something that is designed to be knocked down.

activities.name: Blow My House Down
activities.description: Using paper blocks build a house to see if it can hold up to the wind.

activities.name: Build It Up and Knock It Down Relay
activities.description: Play a relay race to build it up and knock it down.

activities.name: Down Goes the Dominoes
activities.description: Build a domino maze designed to be knocked down.
